verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Depart, <WH1980> and go up <WH5927> hence, <WH4480> <WH2088> thou <WH859> and the people <WH5971> which <WH834> thou hast brought up <WH5927> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> unto <WH413> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I swore <WH7650> unto Abraham, <WH85> to Isaac, <WH3327> and to Jacob, <WH3290> saying, <WH559> Unto thy seed <WH2233> will I give <WH5414> it:

And I will send <WH7971> an angel <WH4397> before <WH6440> thee; and I will drive out <WH1644> <WH853> the Canaanite, <WH3669> the Amorite, <WH567> and the Hittite, <WH2850> and the Perizzite, <WH6522> the Hivite, <WH2340> and the Jebusite: <WH2983>

Unto <WH413> a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey: <WH1706> for <WH3588> I will not <WH3808> go up <WH5927> in the midst <WH7130> of thee; for <WH3588> thou <WH859> art a stiffnecked <WH7186> <WH6203> people: <WH5971> lest <WH6435> I consume <WH3615> thee in the way. <WH1870>

And when the people <WH5971> heard <WH8085> <WH853> these <WH2088> evil <WH7451> tidings, <WH1697> they mourned: <WH56> and no <WH3808> man <WH376> did put <WH7896> on <WH5921> him his ornaments. <WH5716>

For the LORD <WH3068> had said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Say <WH559> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> Ye <WH859> are a stiffnecked <WH7186> <WH6203> people: <WH5971> I will come up <WH5927> into the midst <WH7130> of thee in a <WH259> moment, <WH7281> and consume <WH3615> thee: therefore now <WH6258> put off <WH3381> thy ornaments <WH5716> from <WH4480> <WH5921> thee, that I may know <WH3045> what <WH4100> to do <WH6213> unto thee.
And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> stripped themselves <WH5337> of <WH853> their ornaments <WH5716> by the mount <WH4480> <WH2022> Horeb. <WH2722>

And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> <WH853> the tabernacle, <WH168> and pitched <WH5186> it without <WH4480> <WH2351> the camp, <WH4264> afar off <WH7368> from <WH4480> the camp, <WH4264> and called <WH7121> it the Tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150> And it came to pass, <WH1961> that every one <WH3605> which sought <WH1245> the LORD <WH3068> went out <WH3318> unto <WH413> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> which <WH834> was without <WH4480> <WH2351> the camp. <WH4264>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when Moses <WH4872> went out <WH3318> unto <WH413> the tabernacle, <WH168> that all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> rose up, <WH6965> and stood <WH5324> every man <WH376> at his tent <WH168> door, <WH6607> and looked <WH5027> after <WH310> Moses, <WH4872> until <WH5704> he was gone <WH935> into the tabernacle. <WH168>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> as Moses <WH4872> entered into <WH935> the tabernacle, <WH168> the cloudy <WH6051> pillar <WH5982> descended, <WH3381> and stood <WH5975> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle, <WH168> and the LORD talked <WH1696> with <WH5973> Moses. <WH4872>

And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> <WH853> the cloudy <WH6051> pillar <WH5982> stand <WH5975> at the tabernacle <WH168> door: <WH6607> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> rose up <WH6965> and worshiped, <WH7812> every man <WH376> in his tent <WH168> door. <WH6607>

And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses <WH4872> face <WH6440> to <WH413> face, <WH6440> as <WH834> a man <WH376> speaketh <WH1696> unto <WH413> his friend. <WH7453> And he turned again <WH7725> into <WH413> the camp: <WH4264> but his servant <WH8334> Joshua, <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> a young man, <WH5288> departed <WH4185> not <WH3808> out of <WH4480> <WH8432> the tabernacle. <WH168>

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> See, <WH7200> thou <WH859> sayest <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Bring up <WH5927> <WH853> this <WH2088> people: <WH5971> and thou <WH859> hast not <WH3808> let me know <WH3045> <WH853> whom <WH834> thou wilt send <WH7971> with <WH5973> me. Yet thou <WH859> hast said, <WH559> I know <WH3045> thee by name, <WH8034> and thou hast also <WH1571> found <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in my sight. <WH5869>

Now <WH6258> therefore, I pray thee, <WH4994> if <WH518> I have found <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in thy sight, <WH5869> show <WH3045> me now <WH4994> <WH853> thy way, <WH1870> that <WH4616> I may know <WH3045> thee, that I may find <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in thy sight: <WH5869> and consider <WH7200> that <WH3588> this <WH2088> nation <WH1471> is thy people. <WH5971>
And he said, <WH559> My presence <WH6440> shall go <WH1980> with thee, and I will give thee rest. <WH5117>
And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, If <WH518> thy presence <WH6440> go <WH1980> not <WH369> with me, carry us not up <WH5927> <WH408> hence. <WH4480> <WH2088>

For wherein <WH4100> shall it be known <WH3045> here <WH645> that <WH3588> I <WH589> and thy people <WH5971> have found <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in thy sight? <WH5869> is it not <WH3808> in that thou goest <WH1980> with <WH5973> us? so shall we be separated, <WH6395> I <WH589> and thy people, <WH5971> from all <WH4480> <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> are upon <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the earth. <WH127>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> I will do <WH6213> <WH853> this <WH2088> thing <WH1697> also <WH1571> that <WH834> thou hast spoken: <WH1696> for <WH3588> thou hast found <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in my sight, <WH5869> and I know <WH3045> thee by name. <WH8034>
And he said, <WH559> I beseech thee, <WH4994> show <WH7200> me <WH853> thy glory. <WH3519>

And he said, <WH559> I <WH589> will make all <WH3605> my goodness <WH2898> pass <WH5674> before <WH5921> <WH6440> thee, and I will proclaim <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> before <WH6440> thee; and will be gracious <WH2603> <WH853> to whom <WH834> I will be gracious, <WH2603> and will show mercy <WH7355> <WH853> on whom <WH834> I will show mercy. <WH7355>
And he said, <WH559> Thou canst <WH3201> not <WH3808> see <WH7200> <WH853> my face: <WH6440> for <WH3588> there shall no <WH3808> man <WH120> see <WH7200> me, and live. <WH2425>
And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> there is a place <WH4725> by <WH854> me, and thou shalt stand <WH5324> upon <WH5921> a rock: <WH6697>

And it shall come to pass, <WH1961> while my glory <WH3519> passeth by, <WH5674> that I will put <WH7760> thee in a cleft <WH5366> of the rock, <WH6697> and will cover <WH5526> <WH5921> thee with my hand <WH3709> while <WH5704> I pass by: <WH5674>
And I will take away <WH5493> <WH853> mine hand, <WH3709> and thou shalt see <WH7200> <WH853> my back parts: <WH268> but my face <WH6440> shall not <WH3808> be seen. <WH7200>
